title: Was It Illegal to Profit from Healthcare Prior to the HMO Act of 1973?
subtitle: While there are myriad arguments to be made that the legislation contributed to expansion of for-profit insurance companies, the HMO Act of 1973 is misrepresented in memes.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Before the 1973 HMO act was signed into law by Richard Nixon, it was illegal to profit from healthcare.
